courseDescription: An introductory course covering the fundamentals of programming logic and problem-solving techniques using a high-level programming language.
This course explores advanced data structures and algorithms, including arrays, linked lists, trees, and sorting and searching algorithms.
A comprehensive study of object-oriented programming principles, design patterns, and their application in software development.
Introduction to the design and implementation of database management systems, including relational database models and SQL programming.
An in-depth exploration of web development technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and server-side scripting languages.
This course covers software development methodologies, requirements analysis, design principles, and project management techniques.
An introduction to the theory and techniques of artificial intelligence, including search algorithms, machine learning, and natural language processing.
This course explores parallel and distributed computing paradigms, including multi-threading, multiprocessing, and distributed systems.
An overview of cybersecurity principles, cryptography, network security, and ethical hacking techniques.
This course covers software testing methodologies, quality assurance processes, and tools for ensuring software reliability and correctness.
